Title: Amazon deepens tech-sector gloom with another 9,000 layoffs
Description:
By Jeffrey Dastin and Tiyashi Datta

(Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc on Monday said it would axe another 9,000 roles, piling on to a wave of layoffs that has swept the technology sector as an uncertain economy forces companies to get leaner.

Title: Amazon to cut 9,000 jobs in second round of layoffs, says report
Description: Amazon said it is laying off 9,000 more employees in the next few weeks, mostly in AWS, advertising and Twitch, according to media reports
